message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth in the current market.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $9,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
